title: Are experts who say we shouldn't worry about superintelligent AI wrong? - Quora

response.answer_text: you must take into consideration who those in AI work for and determine from their past actions if there is something to worry about. people who create AI are not in it for the betterment of mankind (unless its for those who AI cannot be used against) meaning the rich. they will always have failsafe devices to keep them from being victims of their own power.

To quote Andrew Ng, worrying about AGI is like worrying about overpopulation on Mars. The analogy of guns makes sense to me: don’t worry about guns - worry about people with bad intentions with guns. You don’t need superintelligent AI to do wrong.
